text_logic_form: The line segment $AB$ is the diameter of the circle $D$.
The length of the line segment $AC$ is $8$.
The length of the line segment $BC$ is $15$.
Find the circumference of the circle $D$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line segment $AB$ is the diameter of the circle $D$.
The length of the line segment $AC$ is $8$.
The length of the line segment $BC$ is $15$.
Find the circumference of the circle $D$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $B$ lies on the circle $D$ with radius $r$.
Point $A$ lies on the circle $D$ with radius $r$.
Point $C$ lies on the circle $D$ with radius $r$.
circle_instances: There is a circle $D$ with center at point $D$ and radius $r$.
